LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.label: no herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.description: 나와 같은 종류의 사람은 나 혼자뿐이에요. 혼자라서 너무 불안해요.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.label: small herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.description: 나와 같은 사람이 있긴 하지만, 우리는 여전히 소수의 무리일 뿐이에요. 아직 안전하다고 느끼지 못해요.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.label: decent herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.description: 우리 무리 안에는 사람들이 꽤 있어요. 수가 많으니 안전해요!
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.label: huge herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.description: 우리 무리 안에는 사람들이 많아요. 두려울 것이 없어요!
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.label: no pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.description: 나와 같은 종류의 사람은 나 혼자뿐이에요. 제대로된 무리가 없어서 너무 외로워요.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.label: small pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.description: 나와 같은 사람이 있기는 하지만, 우리는 아직 작은 무리일 뿐이에요. 조금 쓸쓸해요.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.label: decent pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.description: 우리 무리 안에 사람들이 괜찮은 수로 있어요. 함께 있어서 기뻐요.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.label: huge pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.description: 내 패거리에는 많은 사람들이 있어, 이건 굉장해!

LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: 나.. 깃털로 뒤덮였어... 으악! 뭣!? 내가 방금 계란을 낳은... 오.. 안돼...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: 깃털도 풍성하고, 날개도 꽤 멋- 꼬꼭! 이게 무슨- 계란? 대단해!
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: 오 이런, 이 깃털은 정말 역겹군. 그리고 이 발톱은 또 어떻- 꼬꼬댁! 이게 무슨- 오 안돼... 제발 저게 달걀이 아니라고 해줘...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: 이 깃털이랑 발톱 진짜 맘에 든다, 그리고 알도 낳을수 있고! 둥지하나 구해서 죽치고 앉아있을 수만 있다면...
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: 다시 인간으로 돌아왔어! 달걀 낳는것도, 먹는것도 이제 그만!
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: 이 깃털을 봐! 달걀도! 혹시 내가 만든 아침식사가 별로니?
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: 손과 발. 그리고 가장 중요한건 달걀을 더 안낳는다는 거야! 절대로!
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: This thing on my... beak... is gross...
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: What... is this thing hanging from my face?!
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: These feathers and talons are so cool!
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I'm back to my normal, human self again!
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: But the feathers were so cool...
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.descriptio: Hands, feet, and a normal face. Thank Randy.
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm- QUACK! covered in feathers- QUACK!
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: They way these feathers feel is amazing! Now where can I find some bread...
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: Oh man, I look like some kind of monster. I want revenge on the QUACK that did this to me.
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more feathers...
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But the feathers! My beak! I would have preferred to stay that way.
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Hands at last. I can go the rest of my life without eating bread.
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I'm- HONK! covered in feathers- HONK!
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: I think I could tie up this look with a red bow around my neck.
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: Change me back! I- HONK! -ing hate geese!
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more feathers...
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But the feathers! My beak! I would have preferred to stay that way.
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Hands at last. I'd prefer not to be a demon-spawn bird.
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: Why do I feel like attacking the next person I see?
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: These legs feel so powerful! This beak looks so threatening!
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. Is this a tumor growing out of my head?!
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: I never thought I could feel so strong with avian genes!
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: Awww... I'll miss those strong legs.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: No more rough feathers. I'm not going to miss that growth on my head either.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I don't think I can get used to walking around like this.
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I can run so quickly now!
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. I don't want to be an overgrown chicken!
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: This is pretty cool. I wonder how fast I can run now.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Awww... I'll miss those fast legs.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more rough feathers! No more beak!
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I don't think I can get used to walking around like this.
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: Is anyone up for a race?
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. I don't want to be an overgrown chicken!
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: This is pretty cool. I wonder how fast I can run now.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Awww... I'll miss those fast legs.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: No more rough feathers! No more beak!

LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: 이거 괜찮네. 근데 몸이 좀 커다라면 훨씬 좋을텐데...

LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.label: 폭신한 뭉치
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.description: 이 꼬리 너무 무거워... 아님 그냥 내가 느려진건가?
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.label: 폭신한 뭉치
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.description: 이렇게 커다랗고 폭신한 꼬리를 불평할 순 없지!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.2.label: 폭신한 뭉치
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.label: 두터운 털
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.description: 깨있는 모든 시간을 이 털 깎는데 쓰는것 같아...

LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.1.description: 이건 마치 커다랗고 포근한 이불같아... 내가 가는데마다 따라오기도 한다고!
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.label: 두터운 털
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.description: 이 털은 너무 텁텁하고, 덥고, 간지러워... 진짜 하나도 안좋아!
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: 몸이 너무 무겁고 코가 너무 걸리적거려
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: 와! 이거 대단한데? 뿌우 소리도 한번 내볼까?
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴

LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: 내가 너무 작아졌어. 이건 내가 원하던것의 정 반대라구!
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.0.label: Elephant trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.1.label: Elephant Trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.2.label: Elephant Trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.0.label: 커다란 귀
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.label: 커다란 귀
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.description: 저 멀리 떨어진 소리도 다 들려!
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.label: 커다란 귀
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.description: 내가 돌연변이 괴짜새끼란걸 이보다 더 잘보일수 있을까?
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.0.label: 코끼리 꼬리

LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.2.label: 코끼리 꼬리

LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.2.label: 거대한 발
몸이 너무 무거워, 이 코뿔은 또 어떻고...
날 되돌려 놓지 않으면 들이받아 버리곘어!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.descri: 너무 약한 기분이야. 전처럼 특별하지가 않다고.
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.descri: 너무 약해진 기분이야. 더 원했다고, 덜이 아니라!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.label: 코뿔소 뿔
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.description: 정착지에서 내 머리를 벽걸이 장식으로 쓰고싶지 않길 바래야지...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.label: 코뿔소 뿔
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.description: 이 위엄있는 뿔은 봐! 강력한 기분이야!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.2.label: 코뿔소 뿔
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.0.label: 코뿔소 귀

LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.label: 코뿔소 귀
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.description: 난 내 귀가 좋아, 이런 이상한 빨대 같은거 말고...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.0.label: 코뿔소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.1.label: 코뿔소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.2.label: 코뿔소 꼬리
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: 힘이 세진건 괜찮은데, 시도 때도 없이 배가 고파.
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: 이 힘과 아름다운 뿔이 정말 맘에 들어... 변방계에서 가장 현명한 동물로 완전히 변하는건 더 좋은 기분일거야!
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: 더이상 감당 할수 없을 것 같았어.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.label: 트럼보 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.description: 좀 지저분하네, 썩 맘에 들진 않아.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.1.label: 트럼보 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.2.label: 트럼보 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.0.label: 트럼보 귀
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.1.label: 트럼보 귀
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.2.label: 트럼보 귀
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.label: 트럼보 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.description: 꼬리 있는게 좀 이상하긴 한데, 되게 사치스러운 기분이 들긴 하네.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.label: 트럼보 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.description: 너무나도 부드럽고 폭신 합니다. 이런게 있으면 베개같은건 필요 없겠군요!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.label: 트럼보 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.description: 누가 아름답다고 생각하건 말건 무슨상관이야! 내가 싫은데!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.0.label: 날카로운 뿔
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.label: 날카로운 뿔
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.description: 위엄이 넘친다... 어 잠깐, 위엄이 넘치는건 나 였어!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.label: 날카로운 뿔
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.description: 이걸 잘라서 팔면... 아마도 이걸 되돌릴수 있는 약을 구할수 있지 않을까... 제발...
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.2.description: 별로 맡고싶지 않은 냄새까지 맡게 되버렸어. 다시 되돌리고 싶어.
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.0.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.0.description: 약간 너무 민감한데, 편하게 있기엔 모든게 너무 크게 들려.
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.1.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.1.description: 귀가 정말 잘들린다. 정착지 반대편에서 바늘 떨어트리는 소리도 들을 수 있을것 같아!
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.2.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.2.description: 나에 관해서 말하는게 다 들려. 도대체 왜 이런일이 일어나는거야?
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.0.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.0.description: 바지에 꼬리구멍 뚫는게 어렵지 않길 바래.
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.1.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.2.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.2.description: 걸리적거리지 않고는 의자에 앉을 수 조차 없어!
So I'm the pet dog now? ...arf?
They keep telling me 'fetch'...but I'm not a damn dog!
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.3.descri: No more napping on laps for me.
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.0.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.1.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.2.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.0.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.1.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.1.description: 생긴것도 귀엽고. 전보다 잘들려! 윈-윈이 이런거구나!
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.2.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.0.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.1.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.1.description: 너무 흥분돼! 꼬리가 엄청 빨리 흔들린다!
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.2.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.2.description: 내가 왜 이 쉴틈없이 움직이는 꼬랑지 때문에 바지 전부를 망쳐놔야 하는거냐구!
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: 이 털가죽때문에 너무 더워서, 가만히 있어도 숨을 헐떡거리게 돼
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: 이 털 정말 끔찍해. 냄새도 너무 강하고.
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 이 털이랑 냄새가 너무 좋아, 더 깊이 파고들고 싶어!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 냄새도 정상으로 돌아왔고, 하울링 하고싶은 욕구도 사라졌어!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
내가 괴물처럼 느껴져... 나를 제어하기가 힘들다...
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.3.desc: 지금 난 너무 약해... 날 되돌려 놔!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: 이 근육덕분에 엄청 강력해진 기분이야, 평생도 달릴 수 있겠어!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: 나 너무 못생기고 동물같아졌어. 너무 싫어!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 짐승과도 같은 힘이 느껴진다! 분명 완전히 와르그가 되면 더 좋을거야!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: 다시 정상이야. 야채가 다시 먹을만 해졌어!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 너무 약해진 기분이야. 고기도 그냥 그렇네.
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 그 짐승같은 생김새와 본능이 없어졌어, 휴!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 너무 약해진 기분이야. 더 원했다고, 덜이 아니라!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.label: 와르그 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.description: 턱이 엄청 강해졌어... 절대 실수로 혓바닥 깨물면 안되겠다.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.label: 와르그 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.description: 턱의 치악력이 엄청납니다! 나이프가 필요가 없겠네요!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.2.label: 와르그 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.0.label: 와르그 귀
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.1.label: 와르그 귀
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.label: 와르그 귀
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.description: 이 귀는 시체나 파먹는 와르그한테 달리는 거라고... 내가 아니라!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.label: 와르그 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.description: 이 망할 꼬리가 닿는 모든걸 쓰러트리고 있어!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.label: 와르그 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.description: 이거 믿을 수 없을 정도로 쎄다. 다른사람이랑 이걸로 팔씨름 해도 이길 수 있을것같아!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.2.label: 와르그 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.0.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.1.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.2.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.0.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.0.description: 아얏! 이거 모든 소리를 다 듣네.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.1.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.2.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.0.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.0.description: 꼬리가 거치적대긴 한데, 균형잡는데 도움이 되네.
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.1.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.2.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.0.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.0.description: 내 눈에서 이상한 느낌이 나는데, 전보다 훨씬 잘보이긴 해.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.1.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.1.description: 어둠속에서도 훤히 보이고, 정말 신비로워 보여!
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.2.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.0.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.1.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.1.description: 발톱은 참 쓸모있단 말이지, 칼같은건 다신 안써도 될만큼!
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.2.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.2.description: 이 손톱때문에 자꾸 옷에 구멍이 난다!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: 사냥감을 덮치려는 본능을 주체하기 너무 힘들다.
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: 멍청하고 커다란 고양이가 되고싶지 않아! 나 고양이 싫단말야!
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: 난 그냥 평범한 고양이가 아니라, 간지나는 삵이라고!
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: 털이 너무 갑갑해지고 있어... 엄청 날리는것도 문제고.
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: 난.. 고양이인가? 잠깐, 쓰다듬지 마. 난 발톱도 있고, 이걸 쓸 의향도 있어.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: 고양이? 내가 고양이가 됐어! 냥냥냥, 냥냥냥!
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: 세상이 너무 밝고 자세하게 보여. 이 손톱때문에 상처도 계속 나고.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: 와! 온 세상도 정말 세밀하게 보이고, 이 손톱도 정말 유용한 도구야! 네발로 다니면서 작은 공간을 보는건 어떤 느낌일까?
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: 다시 인간으로 돌아왔어! 털과 날카로운 손톱, 이젠 안녕!
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 손톱이 드디어 없어졌어! 실수로 찌를 일도 없겠다!
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴

LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: 멍청하고 커다란 고양이가 되고싶지 않아! 나 고양이 싫단말야!

LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: 하기도 싫은 닭사냥을 나가야 할것 같아!
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: 캥! 이거 엄청나! 달걀 샌드위치나 하나 먹을까!

LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: 오오, 너무 늘씬해! 완전히 여우로 되도 재밌겠는걸.

LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 나 진짜 푸근했었잖아! 이건 내가 원하는게 아니라고!

LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.1.description: 뾰족하고 복슬복슬한 귀! 이거 대단한데? 모든 소리가 다 들려!

LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.2.description: 내 얼굴은 끝장났어, 말도 제대로 못하곘다고!

LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.1.label: 너구리 귀
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.2.label: 너구리 귀

LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.1.description: 부드러움으로 만들어진 막대기같아! 꼬리 정말 좋은데!
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.2.label: 줄무늬 꼬리
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남

LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 좋아, 하지만 누가 날 들어서 끌어 안는다면?

LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 웩! 잔디가 다시 맛 없어졌어... 그만 먹어야겠다.
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 내 이빨이 다시 정상이 됐어! 경배하라!

LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.0.label: 토끼 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.label: 토끼 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.description: 내 작고 귀여운 코좀 봐! 너무 좋아!
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.label: 토끼 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.description: 나 이파리 먹지 않았어, 넌 아무것도 못본거야!
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.label: 토끼 귀
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.1.label: 토끼 귀
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.2.label: 토끼 귀

LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.1.label: 토끼 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.label: 토끼 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.description: 아니, 네 당근 안 훔쳐갔다고 몇번이나 말해?
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.label: 토끼다리
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.label: 토끼다리
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.description: 이게 행운을 가져다 준다지! (역자주: 토끼발은 행운을 가져다준다고 함)
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.label: 토끼다리
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.description: 이건 잘못됬어. 내 발이 이상하다고. 털에 뒤덮여 있다니, 이건 단단히 잘못됐어!
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.0.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.descriptio: 우아하고 유연해, 내 예전 손보다 좋은걸!
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.2.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.0.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.1.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.1.description: I can eat whatever I want!
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.2.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.2.description: God, I look so ugly with this thing...
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.0.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.0.description: Why are my ears so small?
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.1.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.1.description: These tiny ears are so cute!
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.2.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.2.description: Does anyone have a hat I can hide these things under?
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.0.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.1.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.2.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.2.description: 더러운 느낌이나. 도둑이 된거같고.... 그래서 벌을 받고 있는걸까..?
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.0: I have.. An unpleasant urge to chew on trees. It's very distracting.
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.1: I have powerful teeth, and a powerful tail. I feel like I could build a dam by myself!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.2: How am I supothst to sthpeak with thethse giant teeth?! Let alone eat?!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.3: This is fantastic! But can I go any further with this...?
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.0.descr: I'm back to normal, but it feels like I have splinters in my gums...
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.1.descr: I'll miss my fur coat. And being able to bite through wood.
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.2.descr: I'm back to my old self! No more buck teeth for me!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.3.descr: So close to my dream, and yet, so far...
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.0.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.0.description: That tree over there looks delicious...
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.1.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.2.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.0.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.0.description: These ears are kind of weird.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.1.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.2.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.2.description: These ears are really weird, get them off!
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.0.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.1.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.2.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.2.descriptio: I want to use this thing to slap whoever did this to me!
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I'm a.. Rodent of some kind? These teeth are awkward.
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: I have a lovely coat of fur, even if it is a tad thin.
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: This is awful! Look at my teeth, what happened to my legs?! Help!
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: One step closer to the wild side.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: Back to normal, that fur was getting a bit itchy.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: I miss my fur, it was nice and warm.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: Aah, back to normal. I've never missed my skin so much.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: No! I was so close! Why did they change me back?!
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: 나무도 타고, 열매도 좀 묻고... 이게 바로 인생이지!
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: 이 거대한 이빨이며 육중하고 가시덤불같은 꼬리... 되돌려줘, 부탁이야!
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.0.label: 다람쥐 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.1.label: 다람쥐 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.2.label: 다람쥐 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.2.description: 이 망할 이빨 Tlqkf whssk 싫어!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.label: 다람쥐 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.description: 견과류만 먹어도 살수 있을거같아... 야생동물 처럼 말야!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.label: 다람쥐 귀
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.description: 이건 좀 이상한데, 그렇게 나쁘진 않네
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.1.label: 다람쥐 귀
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.2.label: 다람쥐 귀
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.label: 다람쥐 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.description: 잠깐, 이게 이렇게나 커다랄 필요가 있어?
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.1.label: 다람쥐 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.2.label: 다람쥐 꼬리
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: Being a rat is one thing, but an explosive one...?
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: These sacs are kinda' gross, but also really cool! I'm a chemfuel factory!
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I'm covered in chemical pustules. This is disgusting, change me back!
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Not far from the real deal!
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm no longer high-explosive, which is nice. Maybe people will stop avoiding me now.
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I kinda' miss being a weapon of mass destruction.
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: The memories will haunt me, but I'm normal again!
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I could have been so much more, what a waste.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.0.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.1.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.1.description: I look cute, for an explosive rat.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.2.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.2.description: HOW? How could there be something worse than a rat!?
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.0.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.1.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.1.description: This make enemy easier to hear, yes-yes?
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.2.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.2.description: I have a deep feeling that makes me want to hear an explosion, I don't like this one bit!
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.0.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.0.description: I keep getting this useless skinny tail stuck in all the doors.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.1.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.2.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.2.description: I'm cutting this skin tag off!
Now everyone wants to pet me... Great...
Why do I feel so fragile ? And NO you can’t pet me!
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.0.descri: Finally, I had enough of being petted...
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.2.descri: It feels good not having glass bones!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.0.label: 작은 설치류 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.1.label: 작은 설치류 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.2.label: 작은 설치류 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.0.description: Huh... they're kinda cute, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.2.description: Does anyone have a hat I can hide these things under?
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.0.description: Well, it *is* a little cool, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.1.description: Awww, it's so tiny! I love it!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I'm literally being used as a guinea pig!
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: This is so cool, I might break into squeak!
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: I don't want to be used for any more experiments!
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: Back to normal. I have my face back!
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: No one calls me cute anymore.
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.3.descrip: But I liked being cute and fluffy!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.0.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.0.description: I don't like these chubby cheeks.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.1.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.1.description: Now everyone wants to give me a boop. I like it!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.2.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.2.description: How am I supposed to eat with only four teeth?!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.0.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.0.description: I guess I can hear a little better.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.1.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.2.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.2.description: Can't these things stay up at least? They keep folding over.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.0.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.0.description: These paws aren't the worst thing that's happened to me. They're almost useful.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.1.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.1.description: They're so dainty and dextrous, I can do fine work with these.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.2.label: 설치류 손
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.2.description: They're too small and delicate. They look rediculous!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.0.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.1.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.1.description: I like these feet. They're cute.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.2.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.2.description: These tiny delicate feet are useless!
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 쥐 변이체가 됨
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 쥐 변이체가 됨
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 쥐 변이체가 됨
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.label: 쥐의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.description: 내 취향보다 너무 민감해. 냄새가 너무 강해서 정신이 아찔할 정도야.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.label: 쥐의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.description: 사람들이 쥐는 징그럽다고 하는데, 나한테는 좀 괜찮아보이는것 같아!
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.2.label: 쥐의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.0.label: 쥐의 귀
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.1.label: 쥐의 귀
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.2.label: 쥐의 귀
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.0.label: 쥐꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.1.label: 쥐꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.label: 쥐꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.description: 더러운 느낌이나. 도둑이 된거같고.... 그래서 벌을 받고 있는걸까..?
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: 내가... 커다란 곰이된건가? 이런 상황에선 뭘 해야하는거지?
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: 안돼, 안돼, 안돼! 털복숭이 곰이 된다니, 너무 싫다고!
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 멋지고 좋긴 한데, 어마무시한 발톱을 가진, 더 큰 곰이 되는건 어떨까?
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: 다시 인간으로 돌아왔어! 드디어 겨울잠에서 해방이다!
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 아, 그 커다란 발톱이 참 좋았는데...
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 털이 없어졌어! 피부야, 내가 널 얼마나 그리워 했는지 몰라...
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.label: 곰 귀
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.description: 그렇게 나쁘진 않네. 적어도 겨울에 귀는 안시리겠어.
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.1.label: 곰 귀
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.2.label: 곰 귀
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.label: 아주 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.description: 꼬리가 달릴거면 차라리 좀 멋진게 달렸으면 좋았을텐데...
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.1.label: 아주 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.2.label: 아주 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.label: 거대한 손바닥
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.description: 아무것도 잡을 수가 없는데 뭘 어떻게 해야하지?
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.label: 거대한 손바닥
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.label: 거대한 손바닥
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.description: 내 손을 이렇게 만든놈을 후려 치긴 딱 좋겠다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: 곰 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.descriptio: 모든걸 공격하고 싶어하는 끔찍한 환각이 보여...
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.0.label: 도마뱅 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.1.label: 도마뱅 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.2.label: 도마뱅 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.2.descriptio: 으윽! 이 역겨운 비늘덮인걸로 밥을 먹어야 한다니!
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.0.label: 도마뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.0.description: 자꾸 문에 걸리네, 그래도 균형감각에 도움이 되는것 같아.
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.1.label: 도마뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.1.description: I can use this to whip people like a real lizard! Maybe it will help me swim too...
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.2.label: 도마뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.IguanaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: 안돼 안돼 안돼.... 내 피부가 어딘가 있을거야...
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: 이제 땡볕은 따끔거리기만 하는구나... 내가 원하던건 이게 아닌데...
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.label: 가시
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.description: 모자랑 티셔츠 입기가 좀 힘드네, 그래도 할만 해.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.label: 가시
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.description: 이것들은 좀더 새롭고 독창적인 모습으로 스타일링 할수 있을것 같아!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.label: 가시
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.description: 지나가는 모든거에 한번씩 걸리기도 하고, 찔리면 아파!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.label: 뱀 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.description: 쉬시식, 이 쌧바닥때분에 쉬이익 소리 안내기가 너무 힘들어, 쉬익...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.label: 뱀 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.description: 쉬쉬쉭, 날카로운 혓바닥에 어울리는 날카로운 이빨이로구나.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.label: 뱀 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.description: 쉭, 이 멍청한 혓바닥이 공기를 맛보잖아... 이제 모든 썩은내까지 입안 가득하다고, 쉬이익...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.label: 뱀 볏
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.description: 쉬이잇, 이것때문에 티셔-스스스 입기가 너무 힘들어.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.label: 뱀 볏
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.description: 진짜 독특하다! 내가 쉬이이러 하는놈들을 놀래켜 줄 수 있겠어, 쉬이익!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.2.label: 뱀 볏
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.2.description: 쉬이익, 짜증나게 크고 비늘도 까끌까끌해... 으!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.0.label: 뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.1.label: 뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.2.label: 뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: 이 비늘들은 익숙해지러면 한참 걸리겠어... 약간 간지럽다.
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: 와, 엄청 강하고 빨라진 느낌이 들어!
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: MY LEGS! WHERE ARE MY LEGS?!
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: 좋아.... 이제 내가 얼마나 뱀같을 수 있는지 한번 보도록 할까?
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 뭐!? 이런 수준 떨어지는 인간 다리가 다시 생겼다고?
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.0.label: 거북이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.1.label: 거북이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.2.label: 거북이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.0.label: 거북이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.1.label: 거북이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.2.label: 거북이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.2.descripti: 이딴거 때문에 바지에 구멍을 뚫어야 한다고?
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.0.label: 등딱지
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.0.descript: 어... 이거 좀 어색한데. 든든하긴 한데 무겁다.
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.1.label: 등딱지
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.2.label: 등딱지
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.2.descript: 너무 느리고 .. 무거워... 떼버릴 수도 없다고!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I feel like the world is moving so much faster.
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: I've got natural armor now! I'd like to see raiders try and cut through this!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: I look disgusting and now it takes forever for me to walk anywhere! I don't even like turtles!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: Slow and steady wins the race... Maybe I should take a nap in my shell.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: That's better! I was starting to feel like I was slowing people down.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: But being a turtle was so relaxing! I feel so exposed now.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: Finally! I can once again walk at a reasonable pace!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.0.label: 원숭이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.1.label: 원숭이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.2.label: 원숭이 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.0.label: 원숭이 귀
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.1.label: 원숭이 귀
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.2.label: 원숭이 귀
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.0.label: 원숭이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.0.description: 허.... 꼬리로 뭘 집을수가 있네, 좋아.
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.1.label: 원숭이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.1.description: 또다른 손같아. 이게 있으면 생체공학 부품같은거 필요 없겠는걸?
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.2.label: 원숭이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.2.description: 움직이는게 느껴지고, 내가 조종 할수 있다는 느낌이 너무 싫어.
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.0.label: 털복숭이 손
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.1.label: 털복숭이 손
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.1.description: 어쩌면 소원을 들어줄지도 모르지!(*역자주: 세가지 소원을 들어주는 원숭이 손 인용)
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.2.label: 털복숭이 손
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.0.label: 털복숭이 발
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.0.description: 왜 발로 뭘 집을 수 있는거지?
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.1.label: 털복숭이 발
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.2.label: 털복숭이 발
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.2.description: 신발은 왜이렇게 크고, 내 발은 왜이렇게 작아졌지?
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: 면도 해야돼... 변하고 나서 털이 너무 많아졌어
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.1.description: Eating veggies has never been better!
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.2.description: This will go away on its own right...?
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.3.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.3.description: I'll never want for anything but grass ever again!
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.0.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.0.description: I think I can hear the wind through the grass more intensely than before....
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.1.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.1.description: Oh I think I can hear some good grass with these!
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.2.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.2.description: Hope no one tries to put a tag in these!
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.0.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.0.description: This won't help against megascarabs will it?
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.1.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.1.description: I like feeling it flick back and forth on its own like that!
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.2.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.2.description: I don't think I'll be able to hide this...
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: 으어, 너무 몸이 너무 무거워... 다이어트를 해야하나봐
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: 소처럼 되서 음머 하면 기분이 좋을거야. 음머 하는것도 기분이 엄청 좋을것 같아.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: 제발, 안돼! 이제야 겨우 체중감량에 성공했단말야! 왜!?
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: 이것도 정말 좋긴 한데, 완전한 체험도 재밌을거 같아... 안그래? 그게 아님 내가 지금 정상적인 사고가 안되는거겠지...
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 아... 재밋었는데. 그래도 '음머' 하는건 계속 해야겠다.
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 그래, 그냥 내 인생의 모든 재미를 빼앗아가지 그래?
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.0.label: 소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.1.label: 소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.2.label: 소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.3.label: 소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.0.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.1.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.description: 사포같은걸로 갈아버릴 수 있지 않을까... 다시 자라나려나?
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.label: ...젖통?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.label: ...젖통?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.description: 오..엄.... 이건 의외의 결과야, 잠시 생각할 시간을 좀 가져야겠다...
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.2.label: ...젖통?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.label: ...젖통?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.description: 내 말은, 이것도 꽤 괜찮다는거야. 진짜 소가 된거같아!
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I can barely see from underneath all this hair.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: It's like being wrapped in a warm blanket full-time.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: This is just not natural. My hair is getting everywhere and I can hardly move without it getting stuck in something.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: It would feel good to get shaved right about now.
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: 그래, 그냥 내 인생의 모든 재미를 빼앗아가지 그래?
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.label: 소과의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.description: 얼굴이 너무 뜨겁고 복슬복슬해... 좋은 조합은 아니지...
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.1.label: 소과의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.label: 소과의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.description: "왜 이렇게 창백해?" 라는 소리 한번만 더 들으면, 진짜 아플것같아.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Honestly, I just feel like a hairy cow.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I feel strong enough to carry supplies across the continent.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Have I turned into a cow? I think I'm a cow...
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: I wish I could be grazing in a field right now.
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 아... 재밋었는데. 그래도 '음머' 하는건 계속 해야겠다.
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 그래, 그냥 내 인생의 모든 재미를 빼앗아가지 그래?
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I think I'm going to have to stock up on shampoo.
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Nobody is going to mess with me while I look like this.
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: I've turned into a giant hairy monster!
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: I wish I could be grazing in a field right now.
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 아... 재밋었는데. 그래도 '음머' 하는건 계속 해야겠다.
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 그래, 그냥 내 인생의 모든 재미를 빼앗아가지 그래?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Camelid face
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.0.description: Why do I want a smoke all of a sudden?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Camelid face
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.1.description: I'll look so classy with a cigar!
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Camelid face
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.2.description: My lips are so swollen, did I get stung by a bee?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.0.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.0.description: What am I supposed to do with these?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.1.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.2.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.0.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.0.description: What is this useful for again?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.1.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.1.description: Look at it back there! So cute!
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.2.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.2.description: Can't keep it still even if I wanted to!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: 털복숭이가 되버린데다가 사람들한테 너무 침을 뱉고싶어.
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: 와! 온몸이 털로 덮였어! 발굽도 멋지다!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: 이런 멍청하고 냄새나는 알파카가 되고 싶지 않았어! 당장이라도 털을 밀고싶어!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: 와, 이 털은 정말 포근해! 여기에 손발 모두 발굽이 되서 사족보행까지 한다면!
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: 다시 인간으로 돌아왔어! 북슬북슬한 털도 끝이다.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.descriptio: 털이 없어졌어! 피부야, 내가 널 얼마나 그리워 했는지 몰라...
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.0.label: 털복숭이 코
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.1.label: 털복숭이 코
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.label: 털복숭이 코
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.description: 내 얼굴... 너무 못생겨지고 침도 질질 새...
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.0.label: 털달린 귀
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.1.label: 털달린 귀
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.2.label: 털달린 귀
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.0.label: 털 달린 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.label: 털 달린 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.description: 꼬리? 멋지네! 그다지 쓸모 없으면 어때, 멋으로 달고 다니는거지.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.label: 털 달린 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.description: I think I can cut it off, right?
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I guess I can now live in a desert...
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: Now I can live for two weeks without water!
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: What the hell is wrong with my mouth? So much salvia...
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I’m not gonna miss that hump!
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: I’m gonna miss being able to get away with spitting at people.
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: Finally, I’m as vulnerable to dehydration as nature intended!
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: Even my meal trays look delicious now...
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I'm still on two legs, so I'm not truly the GOAT.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I can speak without a bleat now, thankfully.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But I wanted to be the goat!
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Thank Randy, I no longer smell terrible all the time.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I REALLY wanted to be the goat!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: At least my head is safe!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel great! No one’s going to mess with these horns of mine!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: My head’s so heavy and my neck is killing me!
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: So I lost a killer rack, at least I can wear fresh shirts now!
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I miss headbutting my problems already...
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: My head feels ligher now! I will not miss those horns!
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.0.label: 염소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.1.label: 염소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.label: 염소 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.description: 내 얼굴... 내 얼굴에 무슨 일이 생긴거야!?
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.0.label: 염소 귀
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.1.label: 염소 귀
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.label: 염소 귀
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.description: "염소는 영어로 클로린이야" 같은 소리 하기만 해봐, 가만 안둬!
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.0.label: 염소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.1.label: 염소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.2.label: 염소 꼬리
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: 와... 털이 엄청 많네. 가위를... 아니, 내말은 면도기를 어디다가 뒀더라?
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: 흠... 메에에가 얼마나 더 양 같아질 수 있을까?
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: 고마워요 랜디! 이제 젖은 털 냄새가 나질 않네요!
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 아... 덜이 아니라 더 양 같아지고 싶었는데말야...
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.label: 양의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.description: 메에에에에에? 딱히 풀을 뜯어 먹고싶진 않은데...
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.1.label: 양의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.2.label: 양의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.label: 양의 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.description: 풀을 먹을수 있는데 요리할 필요가 어디있겠어!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.0.label: 양의 눈
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.1.label: 양의 눈
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.2.label: 양의 눈
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.0.label: 양의 귀
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.1.label: 양의 귀
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.2.label: 양의 귀
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.0.label: 양 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.1.label: 양 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.label: 양 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.description: 나한텐 너무 이상해보여. 그래도 숨길수는 있을거같네.
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: Well at least I won’t get cold in the winter...
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I can’t wait to see the shape of my antlers!
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: They would not leave me outside in winter, would they?
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Much better, these antlers were pretty heavy...
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I feel defenseless without my antlers...
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: Finally, I had enough of sowing these antlers!
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.label: 순록 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.description: 어머나 '사슴'에... 익숙해 지려면 시간 좀 걸리겠는데...
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.1.label: 순록 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.2.label: 순록 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.0.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.0.description: At least they keep the flies off themselves...?
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.1.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.2.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.0.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.1.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.2.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.2.description: Just big enough to be hard to hide... great...
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.0.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.1.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.2.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.2.description: Just big enough to be hard to hide... great...
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Great, now I look like a big, shaggy lump.
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I feel so majestic, so imposing. This is awesome!
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: An elk? Isn't that just a big deer? Oh I don't care! Just make it stop!
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: A good start, how far can I go?
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Oh the humanity! MY humanity! Yay!
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I was so close to perfection...
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.0.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.0.description: I can barely talk with this thing...
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.1.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.2.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.0.label: 순록 귀
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.1.label: 순록 귀
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.2.label: 순록 귀
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.0.label: 순록 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.1.label: 순록 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.2.label: 순록 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.0.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to rest on my pillow?
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.1.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.2.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.2.description: These things are horrible. I'm so top heavy now I can hardly walk in a straight line.
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.3.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.3.description: With these, I'd be right at home in the forest.
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: 으윽... 내 몸에서 화학연료 냄새가 나... 아직까지 썩 좋진 않네...
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: 좀 이상하긴 해도, 익숙해 질수 있을것 같아, 펑!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: 윽! 화학연료 냄새도 풍기고, 금방이라도 터질것 같은 기분이야!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: 나쁘진 않네... 하지만 네발로 뛰어다니는게 더 재밋을거같아... 안그래?
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.label: 폭탄사슴 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.description: 딱하나 완벽한게 있네, 풀 뜯어먹기에 말야.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.1.label: 폭탄사슴 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.label: 폭탄사슴 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.description: 아니, 넌 풀을 뜯어먹고싶지 않아! 그만 생각해!
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.0.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.1.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.2.label: 폭탄사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.0.label: 화학연료낭
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.label: 화학연료낭
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.description: 그래, 이건 좀 너무 이상하다. 나한테도 말이야.
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.label: 화학연료낭
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.description: 이거... 오 안돼, 이거 화학연료잖아... 오 안돼 안돼, 이럴순 없다고!
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.label: 화학연료낭
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.description: 뭐 딱히 문제될건 없어보이는데? 특히나 완전히 변해버린다면 말이지.
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: 모든 소리가 너무 크고 무서워! 으악, 뭔소리야! 누구 있어요?
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: 너무나도 우아한 기분이야, 마치 숲속의 지도자라도 된듯한.
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 위품이 넘치는군! 멋지긴 하지만, 아직 조금 모자라
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: 휴, 이제야 좀 덜 깜짝 놀라게 되었네
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: 멋진 뿔 한쌍 정도 있어도 괜찮을텐데..
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: 그래, 그냥 내 인생의 모든 재미를 빼앗아가지 그래?
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.label: 사슴 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.description: 내 코를 좀 봐, 이건 그냥... 짐승이야.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.1.label: 사슴 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.2.label: 사슴 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.0.label: 사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.label: 사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.description: 포식자들의 소리가 너무나도 잘 들려... 어? 아니, 습격자 말야.
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.2.label: 사슴 귀
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.2.description: 총성이 내 귀를 정말 후벼 파는걸
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.0.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.0.description: 사람들이 놀래킬때마다 확 튀지 않았으면 좋겠어...
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.1.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.1.description: 휙, 휙, 휙, 휙, 휙... 오, 미안!
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.2.label: 짧은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.0.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.description: 정말 멋지다! 뭐라도 들이받아서 박살낼 수 있을것 같아!
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.2.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.description: 숲과 더 가까워 졌어, 내 꿈과도 같이.
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: What was that? Nothing? Better keep watching just in case...
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: Wow! I’m so fast and graceful!
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I’m scared all the time and I can’t change my shirt! I hate it!
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Maybe now I won’t need to run anymore?
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I miss the thrill! Everything’s dull and drab now!
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.label: 가젤 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.description: 너무 길긴 한데, 꽤나 흥미로운 무늬가 있네...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.1.label: 가젤 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.2.label: 가젤 얼굴
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.label: 가젤 귀
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.description: 왜이렇게 독특한 마늬가 있는거야? 침략자가 총으로 표적연습하기 딱 좋게...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.label: 가젤 귀
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.description: 더 멋져졌어! 소리란 소리는 다 들려, 풀이 자라나는 소리까지!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.2.label: 가젤 귀
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.label: 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.description: 괜찮네, 아마도 말야... 그래도 숨기긴 쉬우니까.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.1.label: 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.2.label: 작은 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.0.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.0.description: Hope I won’t have to use these!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.1.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.2.label: 사슴뿔
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.2.description: They are all I get to defend myself with?!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: 이런 엄니면 아무도 날 무시 못할거야!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: 난 못생긴 돼지야! 그리고 이 엄니를 양치 하는것도 끔찍하겠지...
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이됨
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: 좋긴 한데, 더욱 나아가서 트러플을 한번 파헤쳐 보는건 어떨까?
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: 와우, 진흙에서 뒹굴거리는것도 생각처럼 나쁘진 않네!
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: 변이 끝남
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.0.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.0.description: Not sure if it's practical but I'll make it work.
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.1.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.1.description: My mule is the cutest thing I've ever seen!
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.2.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.2.description: I don't want to have a long face!
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.3.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.3.description: I'll never want for anything but grass ever again!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.0.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.1.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.1.description: The only advantage I need is the cool factor!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.2.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.2.description: How will I wear hats with these?!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.3.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.3.description: I'm sure they'll let me hear anyone creeping up on me!
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.0.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.0.description: It doesn't get in the way at least.
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.1.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.2.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.2.description: No this isn't right at all!
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.3.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.3.description: It's a natural part of me now!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: 괜히 고집부리고 싶고, 너랑 말도 하기 싫어.
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: 이거 멋진걸! 수레도 한번 끌어보고 싶은데.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: 되돌아옴
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: 되돌아옴
